content:
You're already ahead of the game with your Halloween Party plans at Alton Towers! That sounds like an amazing experience, and I'm sure you'll have a blast.

Regarding your schedule and the operating calendars of the other parks, it's definitely possible to fit in a visit to one of them before the end of the year. Here are some tips to help you plan:

1. **Efteling**: Efteling is open year-round, but their winter season starts on November 15th, with shorter operating hours (10 am to 6 pm). If you can plan a visit before November 15th, you'll have longer hours (10 am to 8 pm) and a better chance of milder weather.
2. **PortAventura World**: PortAventura Park is open until November 17th, and then it closes for the winter season. Ferrari Land is open until November 24th. If you plan to visit PortAventura World, try to go before November 17th to experience both parks.

Considering your schedule and the park operating calendars, here are some potential dates for a visit:

* October 20-21: Visit Efteling before the winter season starts and enjoy the park's autumn atmosphere.
* November 10-11: Head to PortAventura World before the winter closure and experience the parks' autumn festivities.
* November 17-18: Visit Efteling during the winter season, but be prepared for shorter operating hours and potentially colder weather.

Keep in mind that these are just suggestions, and you should check the parks' websites for any special events or closures before planning your visit.

With some careful planning, you should be able to fit in a visit to one of these parks before the end of the year. Good luck, and I hope you have an amazing time!
